description: Information about the donor from which a specimen was collected.
title: Donor organism
name: donor_organism

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

schema_type.description: The type of the metadata schema entity.

provenance.description: Provenance information provided by the system.

human_specific.description: Fields specific to human (homo sapiens) organisms.

mouse_specific.description: Fields specific to mouse (mus musculus) organisms.

genus_species.description: The scientific binomial name for the species of the organism.

sex.description: The biological sex of the organism.
sex.example: Should be one of: male, female, mixed, or unknown.

is_living.description: Whether organism was alive at time of biomaterial collection.
is_living.example: Should be one of: yes, no, not applicable, or unknown.
is_living.guidelines: Enter yes if organism was alive at time of biomaterial collection, no if organism was dead, unknown if not known, and not applicable for ex vivo embryo.

organism_age.description: Age of organism in Age units measured since birth.
organism_age.guidelines: Enter either a single value or a range of values. Indicate a range using a hyphen.

organism_age_unit.description: The unit in which Age is expressed.

development_stage.description: A classification of the developmental stage of the organism.

diseases.description: Short description of known disease(s) of the organism.

death.description: Information about conditions of death of the organism.

familial_relationships.description: Information about other organisms related to this organism.

medical_history.description: Information about the medical history of the organism.

gestational_age.description: Gestational age of pregnancy in Gesational age units measured from the last menstrual period.
gestational_age.guidelines: To calculate, add 2 weeks to embryonic post-ovulation age. Enter either a single value or indicate a range of values using a hyphen.

gestational_age_unit.description: The unit in which Gestational age is expressed.

height.description: Height of organism in Height unit.
height.guidelines: Enter either a single value or a range of values. Indicate a range using a hyphen.

height_unit.description: The unit in which Height is expressed.

weight.description: Weight of organism in Weight unit.
weight.guidelines: Enter either a single value or a range of values. Indicate a range using a hyphen.

weight_unit.description: The unit in which Weight is expressed.

timecourse.description: Information relating to a timecourse associated with this biomaterial.
